unnormalised: Borem, toyar zata mhonn sangatam, bailanno (ani dadleankui je dhiry ani Obstetrics & Gynecology hachea sonvsarant yetat!), kiteak ami garbhaull, zolm ani her vostunche nodren ek bhonvddi kortole zaka "south of the border" mhontat. Ani ho, hanga TMI astolem. Tuzo chetaunni dilea!
normalised: Borem asa, toiar ravat bailanno (ani purushanno zannim dhadas korun Obstetrics ani Gynecology-chea sonvsarant pauvalant!), kiteak ami garbhavastha, zolm ani her vostunchim dokxin dikechean ek bhonvddi korpak vetat. Ani ho, Thoddi Mahiti Zastinch asa. Tumich sodrekar!

unnormalised: Poilech, aum garbhaullchea survatechea lakshannanche khuxi vixim uloitam. Soglleamni sangillem te uzvadd visrun voch, aum 3 mhoineak “sogllo vell doria-vellar dukhi” dislem. Sokallechi tras? Sogllea disa ani ratiche tras! Mhaka bhavta, mhojea padosiche sambhar 2 km pois asun sod’dhim dhuks ani thochnn yevonk laglem. Mhojea doctorin, Dr. Nair, tichea atmeak borem korum, tika hanso ailo ani tinttelache biscuit dilo. Dislem, tinttelache biscuit ani lagimlagim nidh mhoje navech ixtt zale. Tip: Biscuitanche sangroh *soglleakuch* dovrat.
normalised: Poilem kam poilem, aiz garbhavasthechea survatechea lokxonnanchea anandacher uloiavya. Soglleamni vakhannlelem te ujvadak visarun voch, hanv tin moine lagim "sogllokuch dariache bolgeani dukho" uloychi. Sokal dukhi? Dis-rat dukhi asat! Khoimchoi laginche sangacho vas don kilometre koddelean lagta ani anikuch kharab dista. Mhojem voiz, Doctor Nair, tanche atmeak borem korum, fokot haslo ani gingrache biskutam dilim. Gingrache biskutam ani sodanchin nhid mhoje nove ixtt zalet. Prok-tip: Biskutamcho sanco *soglleakuch* samballun dovrat.

unnormalised: Magir "cholo/choli vollokhunk sodunk" vixoi asa. Ami Cloudnine Hospitalan 20-week ultrasound (sumar 20 weeks) korun gheunk gele. Technician, tichea rupachea zhulak borem korum, tinnem amkam sodlem ki amkam vollkhunk zai. Mhojea ghorkar, Rakesh, lagimlaginch "HOY!" mhonn ulo marlo aum ek vakyacher yeunkchea poilem. Dislem, ti ek choli asa! Rakesh lagimlaginch randunk laglo, tem dharun gheun, borem dislem. Randpachi saree gheunk ani nanvanchem brainstorm korunk suru. Ami nimnnem "Aisha" nanv dilem.
normalised: Ani maga "ling sodun kaddop" vostu asa. Ami don-hazar satavea unchayecho ultra sound (don-hazar satavo vikhro) Cloudnine Hospital-ant keli. Tecnicianin, tiche kapaachea mozeak borem korum, vicharlem ki tumi zanno zai astana. Mhojea ghorkarn, Rakesh, tokxonnech "HOY!" ulailo mhojem porippurn vakya korchea adim. Zann zalem ki ti ek cheddum! Rakesh tokxonnech rudanacho maro uloilo, zo sacho korunk sobhit dislo. Sotrekhatir ani nanvankhatir borem vicharuchya bhintin vicho. Ami nimanne "Aisha" theravle.

unnormalised: Zolmachea khuxink visronak! Aum epidural kel’lem (sogleant bori nirnnoy, BTW). Labor 12 voram (sumar) chol’lem, ani mhaka sangunk di, tim nimnnem voram bhov kall dislem. Nurse bori asle. Tim mhaka bondhkobichea tarichem foll zolmachem sangun aashewat ditalem. Bondhkobichem foll? Gambhirponnan? Mhaka bhavlem aum ek *follanchem salad* zolmotalem! Punn Aisha surakshit ailem ani 3.2 kg vajan aslem.
normalised: Zolmachim sukhancher poddon vochpaak ravona! Hanve ek epidural vinnle (borem nirnnoy, tem). Kam bara vorank lagim urlo (lagbhag), ani mhojeak sangonk di, tim nimanne ghante ek sasun dislet. Punn nurse ekdom bhagevont asle. Te mhojeak dukh dili ki ek kalingddim zannmak dita. Kalingddim? Khorench? Mhojeak dislem ki hanv ek puro *fallacho salad* zannmak diunchea vago asli! Punn eyy, Aisha surakxit ani borem ailem, tin point don kilogram-amni tole zalem.

unnormalised: Postpartum jinn bhov bhirantachi zaka dusrem uttor na. Nidh na mellop khorench asa. Ani falea mhaka sangun di, dry shampoo ani vhoddlea sizeche t-shirtache shaktik mhaka novech bhav aasa. Mhajea wardrobean atam 90% aaramache vostr ani 10% "khas konnachem aum punn ek dis vochnastam ghaltelem" aslem. Ani, aum 30 seconds bhitor diaper bodoltolom. Tem mhaka kadninch dharun gheunk zai naslem, punn he, jinn ajapayanchi bhorpur asa!
normalised: Poshtaantachem jivit ekdom vengddeponachem asa. Nidd nasop ekdom sachi vostu asa. Ani sangon di, mhojeak sukhya sampunicho ani voddleo t-shirtticho boreponnuchim vakhannni melllya. Mhaji wardrobe atam novvedo percent sope kapodd ani dhak ten percent "kadachit hanv tem anink pordhot" asat. Also, hanv atam tis secondan thoddear diaper bodolum shakhta. Tem ek hunnar asa zo mhaka kednach lagpacho naslo, punn eyy, jivit bhonvddinchim bhagponnan bharlela asa!

unnormalised: Ani adharanchi sodanchi suvidha? Ai mhojea deva, adharanchi sodanchi suvidha! Soglleamchim ani tankanche ajji bhurgeak koxem vaddoichea vixim ek vichar aso. Breastfeeding versus formula (aum 6 mhoineak breastfeeding kelem, FYI) tem co-sleeping versus cribs, vicharanchi shevott nasli. Mhoji suvidha? Hanspachi, man dhunnpachi, ani punn tumi tumchea bhurgeak borem dische te korat. Tum mai, tumkam borem vollkhotat (choddantri vellar, kiteak asat!).
normalised: Ani magan vicharun naslelem updesh? Oh mhoje dev, vicharun naslelem updesh! Soglleamni ani tanche ajjin tumi tumchim bhurge koxim vaddoik zai tem ek mot asa. Tanachem stan pan korcheani vinn formula (hanve soi moineak tanachem stan pan kelem, tumchi mahiti asli zait) sangatan nidop vinn crib-ak, motamnim niranttaim asa. Mhojea updeshnan? Hasat, manya korat ani tenchni tumi kiteam kori zatat tumche ani tumchea bhurgeak borem dista. Tumi avoy, tumchi mahiti boreponnan asta (sodanchich tumchi mahiti, koxich).

unnormalised: Hanga tumi voitat, obstetrics and gynecology sonvsarant ek (thoddem hasyache) jhollok diun. To dhondlo, to thakovn, ani to nischit ruchik naslo. Punn tem mojea jivnachem bhov faideachem anubhavi asa. Atam tum mhaka maf kortale zalear, aum diaper bodoltolom ani sumar 5 cup chai piyetom. Mhaka borem korum!
normalised: Teka tumche kodde asa, ek (thoddea) haspacho obstetrics ani gynecology sanvsarachi ek dishtti. Tem apshetton asa, tem boreponnamchim nashta ani tem kednach ujjavall naslo. Punn tench mhojea jivitanche boreponnamcho anubhav asa. Atam, tumhim mhojeak maf korat, mhaka diaper bodlonk zai ani lagbhag panch kopp chaha pinvk zai. Borem karum!
